short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a moment to celebrate your achievements on Trello.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply move a card to any list with 游녪 in its name, and watch as a celebratory image appears according to your preferences. It's an effortless way to make accomplishments feel more rewarding!

Installation takes just seconds, and all features can be easily customized through the extension settings.


Key Features

游릭 Customizable Categories: Choose from various image themes including emojis, food, and motivational content to match your style

游릭 Flexible Display Duration: Control how long each celebration appears on your screen

游릭 Custom Positioning: Place the celebration image exactly where you want it on your screen

游릭 Non-intrusive Design: Seamlessly integrates with your workflow while adding moments of joy


Perfect for

游릭 Teams wanting to make task completion more enjoyable

游릭 Individuals seeking positive reinforcement during their workday

游릭 Anyone looking to add a touch of fun to their productivity



游댮 Important

Trello will make future updates to the structure that Trello Plus depends on to function properly. When it does, Trello Plus will stop working.

Most extensions rely on a structure that may change and I have no control over that.

I will do my best to make sure Trello Plus is updated and working in-line with any Trello updates.

Please don't use the Chrome Web Store review system as a way to contact me.

You will find I'm open to feedback and suggestions and working with you to make Trello Plus better.

If Trello Plus consistently stops working for you and I am not aware of any update to Trello, please create a post on our community subreddit (r/trelloplus) on Reddit.


游댮 Browser Compatibility

Trello Plus supports the following Chromium-based browsers:

Chrome, Edge, Opera, Brave and Vivaldi

All other browsers are not supported.
